param.name: show_url
param.label: Show URL
param.description: The article URL can be showed at the beginning or end of the twitter status message.
param.option: Yes, at the beginning of message
Yes, at the end of message

param.name: resend_attempts
param.label: Resend attempts
param.description: AutoTweet resends the status message automatically to twitter if there is an error on twitter api site (e.g. 408 timeout). Here you can change the number of resend attempts. Change this parameter only if you have problems sending to twitter (increase attempts) or with the performance of your site (decrease attempts).

param.name: cleanup_enabled
param.label: Enable cleanup
param.description: For performance reasons it is essential to cleanup the AutoTweet database periodically. The automatic cleanup function removes all messages older than the specified number of days. Normally you should NOT deactivate this function!

param.name: shorturl_service
param.label: Provider
param.description: Disable this service ONLY, if you have problems with the short URLs (broken links, problems accessing the article from tweet link...) If you will use the service from bit.ly you need an account there and you can see your statistics at bit.ly.

param.name: spacer5
param.default: If you will use bit.ly service, please enter your account data here. (If you use the default is.gd, it is not necessary to enter anything.

param.name: bit_key
param.label: bit.ly api key
param.description: You will find the api key in your account data at bit.ly.

param.name: shorturl_always
param.label: Use always short URLs
param.description: If set to Yes, short URLs are used also when not needed for message lenght. This makes sense when you use bit.ly and you will have a complete statistic there.

param.name: cxn_method
param.label: Connection method
param.description: Change this to CURL if you have problems with sockets (fsockopen).

param.name: version_check
param.label: Enable version checks
param.description: If you have problems or warnings on AutoTweet NG Information site (in backend), you can disable version checking and the file autotweet.ini will no longer loaded from the 1st-movers.com server (Of course you will not get information about new versions if this option is disabled).

param.name: @spacer8
param.default: Debugging and test (use this only for test purposes)

param.name: debug_enabled
param.label: Enable debug
param.description: If debugging mode is enabled, you will get more info about sending attempts and twitter return code.
